MissionType.name: Lamplighter prototype
MissionType.attributes: commonwealthFleet, cscPointJuno, rank4, rank5, rank6, lamplighter

Events.OnCreate:
(block (destObj) (switch ; CSC Europa wreck must exist here
(not (setq destObj (sysFindObject aOwnerObj "NT +CSCEuropa;"))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Create the mission
(block () (msnSetData gSource 'destID (objGetID destObj)) (msnSetData gSource 'vaultCode (typGetData &stCSCEuropaWreck; 'VaultCode))
; Set reward (msnSetData gSource 'missionXP 0) ) ) )
Events.OnAccepted:
(block Nil ; Add CSC Europa to map (objSetKnown (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'destID)))
; Track the player (msnRegisterForEvents gSource gPlayerShip) )
Events.OnUpdate:
(switch (msnGetData gSource 'status) Nil
(objGetItems gPlayerShip "wU +LamplighterPrototype;") (block Nil (msnSetData gSource 'status 'foundItem) (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) ) )
Events.OnObjDocked:
(switch ; If the player has docked with Point Juno, and has ; the prototype, then the mission succeeds.
(and (= aObjDocked gPlayerShip) (= (objGetID aDockTarget) (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID)) (objGetItems gPlayerShip "wU +LamplighterPrototype;") (msnGetProperty gSource 'isActive) ) (block Nil ; Take the prototype (enum (objGetItems gPlayerShip "wU +LamplighterPrototype;") theItem (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip theItem) )
; Mission completes (msnSuccess gSource) ) )
Events.OnObjDestroyed:
(switch (and aDestroy (= aObjDestroyed gPlayerShip) (objGetItems gPlayerShip "wU +LamplighterPrototype;") (= (sysGetNode) 'PJ) ) (block Nil ; Remove the prototype from player's ship (enum (objGetItems gPlayerShip "wU +LamplighterPrototype;") theItem (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip theItem) )
(msnFailure gSource) ) )
Events.OnSetPlayerTarget:
(switch (= (msnGetData gSource 'status) 'foundItem) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID)) 'dock)
(rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'destID)) 'dock) )

Language.Text: Recover the project 'Lamplighter' prototype from the wreck of the CSC Europa. The code for the ship's weapons vault is: %vaultCode

"Can you do that?"
"Will you help us retrieve the weapon prototype from the wreckage of the CSC Europa?"

"Excellent! Maybe this weapon will make a difference, eh? We'll enter the coordinates of the wreck into your computer, but you'll need a code to enter the ship's weapons vault. The code is:"
%vaultCode%
"Good luck!"
"\"I'm sorry to hear that. Please come back if you change your mind.\""

"Have you found the CSC Europa and the prototype? Remember that the vault code is:"
%vaultCode%
"Good luck!"
"Excellent work! We're very close to completing the research on this new weapon. Who knows, maybe when you return from your visit to the Gods this war will be over!"
"\"You screwed that mission all the way to Sol and back. You better hit the sims, pilot!\""
